name: classcat
description: Build a space-separated class attribute quickly.
author: Jorge Bucaran

scripts.test: nyc -i esm -r lcov testmatrix test/*.test.js && nyc report && tsc -p test/ts
scripts.build: export pkg=$npm_package_name; npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.release: v=$npm_package_version; npm run build && git commit -am $v && git tag -s $v -m $v && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
